snippet: KeyCorp is close to buying the First Niagara Financial Group, people briefed on the matter said, the latest in a string of transactions that may signal bank deals are back.
abstract: KeyCorp prepares to buy First Niagara Financial Group for around $4 billion.
lead_paragraph: KeyCorp is close to buying the First Niagara Financial Group, people briefed on the matter said, the latest in a string of transactions that may signal bank deals are back.

headline.print_headline: Keycorp Courts First Niagara in the Latest Bank Deal
headline.main: Keycorp Courts First Niagara in the Latest Bank Deal
